Description: Godin LG Custom Hybrid* 24.75 scale 22 Fret Inline Performance Series Neck Full Humbucker PUs 5 position switch, SG, Les Paul type Tuneamatic type of bridge. Cased in a fitted TKL Gig Case one of Custom build Really in super condition. A one of a kind hand assembled Instrument.Super thin neck Quite light (for Mahogany Body ) Almost perfect condition no fret wear. Lightest of Back scuffing, minute pick swirls, No edging or headstock nicks. Carry case is also in good condition with reinforced bottom. 22 Fret and 24.75 scale Plays great and has lots of unplugged tone. The HB,s both have split positions and these by Godin few people replace, Guitar is light and is truly a through the body string mounting with an SG, Les Paul type of bridge. As shown no fret wear at all a super good tonally diverse instrument custom assembled to have all the Tonal qualities of an LG but Having the more modern ultra thin inline Performance series neck. The fitting is perfect! as are all Godin's no neck pocket shimming or angled neck to accommodate as the bodies are the same category just routed differently.This is really a great Gibson sounding type guitar ATTENTON All! Am deleting most of my Guitar Collection. Have listed or will list 3-5 Assorted Instruments Electric and Acoustic. Most are Truly excellent or even near mint as I don't gig or anything most were never out of my home.I'm pricing them below any book value and have assurance of excellent feedback!Be aware they are also REVERBING So if want it, Should take immediate action Please respect a few buyer guidelines if item is a Binow payment will be required immediately. If I agree to your offer I expect terms to be rendered at that time. Mainly though am getting a few non-payment after an auction. This creates issues. I simply will herein be re-listing after two days if I don't have definite validation as to why and re-commitment for the next day.
